## operation-graph package

## Classes

<table><thead><tr><th>

Class


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[Operation](./operation-graph.operation.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The `Operation` class is a node in the dependency graph of work that needs to be scheduled by the `OperationExecutionManager`<></>. Each `Operation` has a `runner` member of type `IOperationRunner`<></>, whose implementation manages the actual process of running a single operation.

The graph of `Operation` instances will be cloned into a separate execution graph after processing.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[OperationError](./operation-graph.operationerror.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Encapsulates information about an error


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[OperationExecutionManager](./operation-graph.operationexecutionmanager.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** A class which manages the execution of a set of tasks with interdependencies. Initially, and at the end of each task execution, all unblocked tasks are added to a ready queue which is then executed. This is done continually until all tasks are complete, or prematurely fails if any of the tasks fail.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[OperationGroupRecord](./operation-graph.operationgrouprecord.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Meta-entity that tracks information about a group of related operations.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[Stopwatch](./operation-graph.stopwatch.md)


</td><td>

Represents a typical timer/stopwatch which keeps track of elapsed time in between two events.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[WatchLoop](./operation-graph.watchloop.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** This class implements a watch loop.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

Interface


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[IAfterExecuteEventMessage](./operation-graph.iafterexecuteeventmessage.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** A message sent to the host upon completion of a run of this task.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[ICancelCommandMessage](./operation-graph.icancelcommandmessage.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** A message sent by the host to tell the watch loop to cancel the current run.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[IExecuteOperationContext](./operation-graph.iexecuteoperationcontext.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Information provided to `executeAsync` by the `OperationExecutionManager`<></>.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[IExitCommandMessage](./operation-graph.iexitcommandmessage.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** A message sent by the host to tell the watch loop to shutdown gracefully.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[IOperationExecutionOptions](./operation-graph.ioperationexecutionoptions.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Options for the current run.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[IOperationOptions](./operation-graph.ioperationoptions.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Options for constructing a new Operation.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[IOperationRunner](./operation-graph.ioperationrunner.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The `Operation` class is a node in the dependency graph of work that needs to be scheduled by the `OperationExecutionManager`<></>. Each `Operation` has a `runner` member of type `IOperationRunner`<></>, whose implementation manages the actual process for running a single operation.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[IOperationRunnerContext](./operation-graph.ioperationrunnercontext.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Information passed to the executing `IOperationRunner`


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[IOperationState](./operation-graph.ioperationstate.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Interface contract for a single state of an operation.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[IOperationStates](./operation-graph.ioperationstates.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Interface contract for the current and past state of an operation.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[IRequestRunEventMessage](./operation-graph.irequestruneventmessage.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** A message sent to the host to ask it to run this task.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[IRunCommandMessage](./operation-graph.iruncommandmessage.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** A message sent by the host to tell the watch loop to perform a single run.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[ISyncCommandMessage](./operation-graph.isynccommandmessage.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** A message sent by the host to ask for to resync status information.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[ISyncEventMessage](./operation-graph.isynceventmessage.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** A message sent to the host upon connection of the channel, to indicate to the host that this task supports the protocol and to provide baseline status information.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[IWatchLoopOptions](./operation-graph.iwatchloopoptions.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Callbacks for the watch loop.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[IWatchLoopState](./operation-graph.iwatchloopstate.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The public API surface of the watch loop, for use in the `executeAsync` callback.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
